name: nativescript-ui-sidedrawer
description: Add additional space to your app. Use it for navigation or custom content. Slides in from all four sides of the screen. Part of Progress NativeScript UI - a set of professional ui components built for NativeScript (also known as Pro UI).

scripts.update.nd.config: cd ../scripts && npm i && tsc && node n-debug-local-config.js
scripts.build.native: npm run build.android && npm run build.ios
scripts.build: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.native && npm run build.angular
scripts.setup: npm run update.nd.config && cd ../src && npm i && npm run update.nd.scripts && npm run build
scripts.test.android: npm run build && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run build && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-ui-sidedrawer && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.ios && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.ios.release: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.ios && cd ../demo && tns run ios --env.aot --env.uglify --env.snapshot --release --key-store-path ../../keystores/testing-key.jks --key-store-password 1234567890 --key-store-alias test --key-store-alias-password 1234567890
scripts.demo.android: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.android && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.android.release: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.android && cd ../demo && tns run android --env.aot --env.uglify --env.snapshot --release --key-store-path ../../keystores/testing-key.jks --key-store-password 1234567890 --key-store-alias test --key-store-alias-password 1234567890
scripts.demo.angular.ios: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.ios && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios
scripts.demo.angular.ios.release: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.ios && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --env.aot --env.uglify --env.snapshot --release --key-store-path ../../keystores/testing-key.jks --key-store-password 1234567890 --key-store-alias test --key-store-alias-password 1234567890
scripts.demo.angular.android: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.android && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android
scripts.demo.angular.android.release: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.android && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --env.aot --env.uglify --env.snapshot --release --key-store-path ../../keystores/testing-key.jks --key-store-password 1234567890 --key-store-alias test --key-store-alias-password 1234567890
scripts.demo.vue.ios: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.ios && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios
scripts.demo.vue.android: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.android && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && npx rimraf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json && cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json && cd ../demo-vue && npx rimraf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json && cd ../src-angular && npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../src && npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i && ts-patch install
scripts.pack: npm run prepare && npm run build && bash ../publish/pack.sh
scripts.nd.build.release: npm run nd.build.release.native.ios && npm run nd.build.release.native.android
scripts.nd.build.simulator: npm run nd.build.simulator.native.ios && npm run nd.build.native.android
scripts.nd.build.device: npm run nd.build.device.native.ios && npm run nd.build.native.android
scripts.nd.demo.android: npm run nd.open.android.studio && npm run nd.demo.tns.run.android
scripts.nd.demo.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.ios.device: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.angular.android: npm run nd.open.android.studio && npm run nd.demo.angular.tns.run.android
scripts.nd.demo.angular.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.angular.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.angular.ios.device: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.angular.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.vue.android: npm run nd.open.android.studio && npm run nd.demo.vue.tns.run.android
scripts.nd.demo.vue.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.vue.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.vue.ios.device: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.vue.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.native.debugger.android: npm run nd.build.native.android && npm run nd.open.android.studio
scripts.nd.native.debugger.ios: npm run nd.build.simulator.native.ios && npm run nd.open.xcode && cd /Users/nathan/Documents/github/NativeScript/masters/pro-ui/nativescript-ui-sidedrawer/src
scripts.nd.native.debugger.ios.device: npm run nd.build.device.native.ios && npm run nd.open.xcode && cd /Users/nathan/Documents/github/NativeScript/masters/pro-ui/nativescript-ui-sidedrawer/src
scripts.nd.demo.run.watch.android: npm run nd.open.android.studio && npm run nd.demo.tns.run.android
scripts.nd.demo.run.watch.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.run.watch.device.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.angular.run.watch.android: npm run nd.open.android.studio && npm run nd.demo.angular.tns.run.android
scripts.nd.demo.angular.run.watch.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.angular.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.angular.run.watch.device.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.angular.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.vue.run.watch.android: npm run nd.open.android.studio && npm run nd.demo.vue.tns.run.android
scripts.nd.demo.vue.run.watch.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.vue.tns.run.ios
scripts.nd.demo.vue.run.watch.device.ios: npm run nd.open.xcode && npm run nd.demo.vue.tns.run.ios
